nodes.text: The BT X-42 heavy flamethrower, also known as the clone flamethrower, was a type of flame-projecting weapon developed for the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. Used by the clone flame troopers, they were designed for use against unarmored targets, such as Geonosian warriors during the Second Battle of Geonosis. It was also used by the Mandalorian Royal Guard.
Apart from the vertical carrying handle, the BT X-42 is identical to the flamethrower model used in Star Wars Galaxies.
